page.title: 17The old Catholic school.
page.content: Today we went to the old Catholic school.There was a large bell hanging outside the porch.There were two classrooms and about 30 children attended.It was built in 1872.It closed 15 years ago.There was a cross on the roof of the schoolhouse.The toilets were outside.There were open fires in the classrooms and there was a window inside between the classrooms so that the nuns could look through. The nuns who taught there stayed in the schoolhouse during the week and went home to the Alnwick Convent for the weekend.There are two very old apple trees in the garden.The building is now a private house and a furniture showroom.
